summary: This document is an AT&T mobility report detailing voice and SMS usage for a specific phone number (646) 243-8517 and associated device (IMEI: 3594090814785818, Apple iPhone X) from July 6, 2019, to August 11, 2019. It was run on August 15, 2019, and appears to be a law enforcement or investigative record, likely related to monitoring communications in the Epstein case.

events.title: Telecommunications Monitoring Period
events.description: AT&T provided detailed call and SMS logs for a specific phone number and device over a five-week period.

keyFacts: The document is an AT&T mobility report for phone number (646) 243-8517, associated with an Apple iPhone X (IMEI: 3594090814785818).
The report covers a critical period from July 6, 2019, to August 11, 2019, which includes the time around Jeffrey Epstein's arrest on July 6, 2019, and his death on August 10, 2019.
It contains detailed call records (over 500 entries) showing call times, durations, and technical features (e.g., Wi-Fi calling, call forwarding).
It also contains SMS message records (over 150 entries) sent and received, including timestamps and network details.
The report was generated on August 15, 2019, by AT&T in response to a query, indicating it was likely obtained for investigative purposes.
